Background:

I started a small business at 16 that focused on providing manual labor. 5 years later when I was getting ready to graduate college I was told to get a real job, so I dissolved my business and entered the real world. Though I enjoyed my job I did I had no passion for it and recently decided it was time to pursue my dream of being a lifelong entrepreneur.

After moving to Boston and being accepted into Boston Startup School numerous doors and networking opportunities have been presented to me. For all this I’m extremely thankful and whether working for a startup or launching my own business I look forward to whatever comes next in my journey.
